name: Original artwork and photography framed in hardwood. From
description:
This catagory has the most variables due to us keeping over fifty original art works and a large catalougue of photography from various sources. We carry regular high street framing and produce our own moulding in hardwood.
We offer natural edge one of frames as well as you can see from the picture and our advice is that you bring in the picture to be framed and have a consoltation  as to what will suit it.
For more information about original artwork for sale please look at our facebook page which is updated with currently availible paintings and prices. Type Lugton Ayrshire Art into the search and our page should appear.

name: Arran natural edge coffee table. Prices from
description:
The example shown is a small coffee table produced from a single section of timber. These tables can be inlaid, made with diffrent legs, produced with one linear rear edge to sit against walls and with added lower sections in which to put magazines, shoes etc.
Your ideas can be included in the design of a piece and sized to fit a space you have in mind.

options.name: Arran natural edge coffee table in oak

name: Natural Edge mirrors. Prices from
description:
Fully enclosed hardwood mirror with choice of beveled and plain mirror in various sizes. 
These mirrors are simple and individual with a practical application combined with stunning asthetics.

name: Natural Edge Arran Tables. Prices start from
description:
Hand made from all solid hardwood using traditional methods with a modern design. 
These tables come in various designs, sizes and finishes for your individual needs. 
Each one is an individual artwork due to the inclusion of the Natural beauty of the material.
Check our website or visit the gallery to see more examples of these tables. 
They are only availible for collection or personal delivery by ourselfs.

options.name: Natural edge Arran tables in oak

name: Natural Edge Arran Chairs.
description:
These chairs are produced from single boards in various designs and with the individuality that comes from using natural edged hardwood.
Please phone or visit to get more information about commissioning your own bespoke chair
